Detail

공통

  • input 태그 readonly="readonly" 추가
  • [class="row"] row 별 요소 배치
  • row 당 최대 column 개수 : 4
  • [class='col-*'] : (column max : 12), column에 비례 [col-*] 클래스 숫자를 부여하여 컬럼 너비 적용
    ex) [class="col-1 ~ col-12"], 또는 [class="col"]
  • label + input 결합 시 => label(1) : input (1) 경우 동일 네이밍
    : ex) label for="userName" == input id="userName"
  • label + input 결합 시 => label(1) : input (n) 경우
    label for, input id 부여 X /
    각 input 태그 title 속성값 선언 input title='해당 인풋 요소에 대한 설명'
  • label for, input id 선언 시 퍼블리싱 소스의 속성값은 임의값으로 해당 항목에 따른 적절한 값으로 수정하여 사용 필요
  • 샘플 페이지 : sample_detail.html

INPUT

Input Text

<input type="text" class="c-input" value="text" readonly="readonly" />

Label + input Text

<div class="row"> <div class="col-6 label-input"> <label for="code">고객사 코드<i class="is-nec">필수입력</i></label> <input type="text" class="c-input" id="code" value="adcd1234" readonly="readonly" /> </div> <div class="col-6 label-input"> <label for="code02">고객사 코드<i class="is-nec">필수입력</i></label> <input type="text" class="c-input" id="code02" value="adcd1234" readonly="readonly" /> </div> </div>

Input Text

명
VIP
<div class="row"> <div class="col-3 label-input"> <label for="unit">검사대상인원</label> <div class="c-input-unit"> <input type="text" class="c-input" id="unit" /> <span class="unit">명</span> </div> </div> <div class="col-3 label-input"> <label for="inputName01_01">이름</label> <input type="text" class="c-input" id="inputName01_01" value="홍길동" readonly="readonly" /> </div> <div class="col-3 label-input"> <label for="inputSearch">검색</label> <div class="c-input-search"> <input type="text" id="inputSearch" value="홍길동" readonly="readonly" /> <button type="button" class="btn-search" disabled><span class="skip">검색</span></button> </div> </div> <div class="col-3 label-input"> <label for="inputName01_02">이름</label> <div class="c-input-mark"> <input type="text" class="c-input" id="inputName01_02" value="홍길동" readonly="readonly"> <div class="is-rate"><span class="is-orange-1">VIP</span></div> </div> </div> </div>

Input Text + Button

<div class="row"> <div class="col label-input"> <label class="c-label-txt" for="inputBtn01">버튼</label> <div class="row inner c-input-btn-group"> <div class="col-10"><input type="text" class="c-input" id="inputBtn01" value="test" /></div> <div class="col-2 input-button"> <div class="buttons"> <button class="c-btn bg-blue-1 input-btn"><span>검진추가</span></button> <button class="c-btn bg-blue-1 input-btn"><span>검진추가</span></button> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="row"> <div class="col label-input"> <label class="c-label-txt" for="inputBtn02">버튼</label> <div class="row inner c-input-btn-group"> <div class="col-11"><input type="text" class="c-input" id="inputBtn02" value="test" /></div> <div class="col-1 input-button"> <div class="buttons"> <button class="c-btn bg-blue-1 input-btn"><span>검진추가</span></button> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>

textarea

<div class="c-article input-list c-textarea-article"> <div class="row"> <div class="col label-input"> <label for="inpuTxtA02">textarea 입력</label> <div class="c-txtarea-field"> <textarea id="inpuTxtA02" class="c-txt-area" readonly="readonly">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Qui voluptates omnis rem, reprehenderit, odit quis soluta quasi voluptas, quos sequi veritatis vel itaque aperiam ea alias. Atque, illum voluptatum modi nesciunt, velit alias, distinctio vel delectus nihil earum pariatur beatae? Cum voluptate beatae unde molestias animi laborum nihil tempore voluptatibus. </textarea> </div> </div> </div> </div>

File

URL

Date

Date type01

<div class="row"> <div class="col-6"> <div class="row inner c-input-date-group"> <!-- for/id 매칭 필수 --> <div class="col-6 label-input"> <label for="startDate01">시작일 (시작)</label> <div class="c-input-date"> <input type="text" class="c-input" id="startDate01" placeholder="YYYY-MM-DD" value="2022-06-11" readonly="readonly"> <span><i class="date-btn"></i></span> </div> </div> <div class="col-6 label-input"> <label for="endDate01">종료일 (종료)</label> <div class="c-input-date"> <input type="text" class="c-input" id="endDate01" placeholder="YYYY-MM-DD" value="2022-06-11" readonly="readonly"> <span><i class="date-btn"></i></span> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
